sentences.en: a humorous glint in her eyes
A mephistophelian glint in his eye.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里露出冷酷的神色.

sentences.en: He answered me carelessly with a glint from the corners of his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他漫不经心地回答我,眼角透出得意的目光.

sentences.en: He arrived with a tremendous smile and a glint in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他来的时候,脸上绽放着笑容,眼睛闪闪发光.

sentences.en: He came up to me with the glint of triumph in his eye.
sentences.cn: 他向我走来，眼里闪现出一丝胜利的神情。

sentences.en: He caught a glint in the shaving mirror.
sentences.cn: 他看到了剃须镜里边闪出的一片光.

sentences.en: He had a wicked glint in his eye, ie suggesting mischievousness.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里闪现着调皮的神情.

sentences.en: I am the diamond glint on snow.
I am the diamonds glint on the snow.
sentences.cn: 我是在雪地里的闪烁的钻石.

sentences.en: Suddenly my eyes caught the glint of a light.
sentences.cn: 我忽然看见隐约地闪现着的亮光.

sentences.en: There was a glint in her eyes that showed she was angry.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛里闪烁着愤怒的目光.

sentences.en: There was a glint of anger in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛闪着愤怒的光.

sentences.en: There was a glint of humor in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里闪出幽默的神情.

sentences.en: There was an ugly glint in Detective Sun's eyes.
sentences.cn: 孙侦探的眼神非常的难看了.

sentences.en: Was there a glint of mockery in his eyes?
sentences.cn: 他的眼里是不是闪过一丝讥讽？

sentences.en: With inward dismay I noted his eyes glint with interest.
sentences.cn: 我内心惊愕地注意到他的眼神中闪烁着充满兴趣的光芒.

trans.tran_cn: 闪光，闪耀，短暂微弱的显露，（雷达的）回波起伏
trans.tran_en: a look in someone’s eyes which shows a particular feeling

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁；（光线）反射；闪闪发光
trans.tran_en: if a shiny surface glints, it gives out small flashes of light

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁，（光线）反射，闪闪发光
闪烁，闪光，窥视，（箭一样）飞出，使发光，使闪光
